channel.title: [DELTA]Euthymia-Twinkie[DELTA]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://t0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSCATqRX9cfJcVksIKcl4xyXtcxsejAqJVCYSOLQN26gdND4NC-[/img][/center] Welcome to Euthymia-Twinkie development thread! This is a server based on Unique, nice, fun, and interacting features, You'll have to adapt yourself to the day and night changes! In some places, when the night has fallen over the world, Some ghosts will appear in some places, there are also quests to do!, I've only added two easy quests that are doric's quest, and Cook assistant, it's not because they're easy, It's just a requirement to do higher level quests!, needles to say that there will customs quests and events! some of them will be related to twinkies! i just fell in love with them they're so good! You gotta try the vanilla ones. There will also be customs minigames and some normal minigames, about the skilling i've removed some skills that i dont find interesting to write, or to be done in the server, but i can always re-add them in the skill tab zone. This is a delta server, yet, that doesn't mean that I'm not prepared or don't know what I'm doing, I've cleaned, packaged, and attempting to implement an Entity based system to do neat stuff on quests!.
I'm aiming to have a main storyline on the server, but I'm not sure yet on where to start. Remember Oblivion2? I had too much ideas for that but yet didn't know how to implement them! I hope i can get ideas for Euthymia now as i think i can do much more stuff!, Euthymia sounds like a disease well i think it actually is, so i'll probably write a disease system!
The gold concept:
Actually player will not be supposed to have 1,000,000 gp, because GP will have a meaning, they are GOLD PIECES, and they will be preciated, even thieving will give a really LOW amount of coins, that's because i want the skill of SMITHIG, and CRAFTING, to be worth training, so you want your armour, either way but it idk like 1000 gold pieces, or do it yourself, as gold will be hard to get, well, the skill is gonna have to be trained! Gold pieces should have a real value. and thats what i wanna do.
[size=14pt]The development team:[/size] [img]http://www.freewebs.com/runepowerforumrswebsite/crown_gold.gif[/img][url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=537662]Strucker[/url] = Server Programmer. [img]http://www.freewebs.com/runepowerforumrswebsite/crown_gold.gif[/img][url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=560587]Skyro[/url] = Server Programmer. [img]http://www.freewebs.com/runepowerforumrswebsite/crown_gold.gif[/img][url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=490965]Clawz Fury[/url] = Server Programmer.
[size=14pt]Supporters[/size] [img]http://vasora.com/forum/images/images/Crowns/Premium.png[/img][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=468771]Arham[/url] I currently need a logo, so if anyone could help me it would be great!
[size=3pt]disclaimer: we are not related to runescape or it's afilliates in any way, this is for learning porpuses.[/size]
Also i think that private servers lack of ways for transportation that why i'll be adding a lot of different ways of transportation, shortcuts and more! not just the fudgeing teleport! tehehe.

item.title: [DELTA]Euthymia-Twinkie[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:9, topic:529019”][quote author=Strucker link=topic=647772.msg4367979#msg4367979 date=1380056971]

So, how are these titles made? “Euthymia-Submarinos” “Euthymia-Twinkie”

Idk i might remove the submarinos-twinkie part, its just a snack i love, if you’re wondering you can click
here
or here

edit & bump

184376378a46d4029ad3641c7c73a93414522a95.png773×534


[/quote]

Wait what, you make an entity say that when it’s not a player, its not an entity? Wut?
Also it’s nice to see you working with an entity system (^ if you got it right at least)
But instead of using instanceof you should really consider using polymorphism. Here’s a link I found helpful: http://www.artima.com/interfacedesign/PreferPoly.html

And instead of putting “if (statement == false)” you can just do “if (!statement)”[/quote]Yep, it was just for a test, hehe. but thanks for linking me there!

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA]Euthymia-Twinkie[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Strucker, post:8, topic:529019”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=647772.msg4367562#msg4367562 date=1379972166]
So, how are these titles made? “Euthymia-Submarinos” “Euthymia-Twinkie”
[/quote]
Idk i might remove the submarinos-twinkie part, its just a snack i love, if you’re wondering you can click
here
or here

edit & bump

184376378a46d4029ad3641c7c73a93414522a95.png773×534

[/quote]

Wait what, you make an entity say that when it’s not a player, its not an entity? Wut?
Also it’s nice to see you working with an entity system (^ if you got it right at least)
But instead of using instanceof you should really consider using polymorphism. Here’s a link I found helpful: http://www.artima.com/interfacedesign/PreferPoly.html

And instead of putting “if (statement == false)” you can just do “if (!statement)”

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA]Euthymia-Twinkie[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[size=14pt]Development log:[/size]

[code=Log]march-Started project
added control panel
added a path!finder
added a door handler, it opens all the doors in a switch statement on a random direction lawl.
Started with client.java 600kb
Ripped smelting from an old server i had.
ripped some spawns
packaged
packets are handled on their own file
added music
added day night system
ghost spawn in draynor manor when night.
added sounds to most of the actions that can be done.
added bone burying
added bone on altar
Client.java heavely reduced, its like 90kb, yet player java gained like 50kb.
Added firemaking
Ripped woodcutting
Ripped herblore
Added fillables
removed dropping, and picking up global items.
added cow milking
added pickables
added flour making
added dorics quest
added cook assistant
added pick pocketing
added somewhat lockpicking
added thieving stalls
added cooking
added mining
Implementing Entity system…
Entity has had two children! wich are their subclasses Player, and NPC
Added canoe…
Added crafting leather…
added smithing interface
added smithing for all daggers
added smithing for all swords
started ripping entity combat system. - Too many changes needed aborted.
added crafting for body
added crafting for chaps
added tanning.
added crafting vor coif
added crafting for vambraces
added crafting for gloves
added crafting for boots
added smithing for all longswords
added smithing for all scimitar
added smithing for all 2 handed
added music to alot of zones.
fixed trading
added boat travelling

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA]Euthymia-Twinkie[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[center][/center]
Welcome to Euthymia-Twinkie development thread!
This is a server based on Unique, nice, fun, and interacting features, You’ll have to adapt yourself to the day and night changes! In some places, when the night has fallen over the world, Some ghosts will appear in some places, there are also quests to do!, I’ve only added two easy quests that are doric’s quest, and Cook assistant, it’s not because they’re easy, It’s just a requirement to do higher level quests!, needles to say that there will customs quests and events! some of them will be related to twinkies! i just fell in love with them they’re so good! You gotta try the vanilla ones.
There will also be customs minigames and some normal minigames, about the skilling i’ve removed some skills that i dont find interesting to write, or to be done in the server, but i can always re-add them in the skill tab zone.
This is a delta server, yet, that doesn’t mean that I’m not prepared or don’t know what I’m doing, I’ve cleaned, packaged, and attempting to implement an Entity based system to do neat stuff on quests!.

I’m aiming to have a main storyline on the server, but I’m not sure yet on where to start.
Remember Oblivion2? I had too much ideas for that but yet didn’t know how to implement them!
I hope i can get ideas for Euthymia now as i think i can do much more stuff!, Euthymia sounds like a disease well i think it actually is, so i’ll probably write a disease system!

The gold concept:

Actually player will not be supposed to have 1,000,000 gp, because GP will have a meaning, they are GOLD PIECES, and they will be preciated, even thieving will give a really LOW amount of coins, that’s because i want the skill of SMITHIG, and CRAFTING, to be worth training, so you want your armour, either way but it idk like 1000 gold pieces, or do it yourself, as gold will be hard to get, well, the skill is gonna have to be trained!
Gold pieces should have a real value. and thats what i wanna do.

[size=14pt]The development team:[/size]
Strucker = Server Programmer.
Skyro = Server Programmer.
Clawz Fury = Server Programmer.

[size=14pt]Supporters[/size]
Arham
I currently need a logo, so if anyone could help me it would be great!

[size=3pt]disclaimer: we are not related to runescape or it’s afilliates in any way, this is for learning porpuses.[/size]

Also i think that private servers lack of ways for transportation that why i’ll be adding a lot of different ways of transportation, shortcuts and more! not just the fudgeing teleport! tehehe.

Read full topic
